translation.en: [girl] Dear Diary...
translation.zh: 亲爱的日记

translation.en: go fuck yourself.
translation.zh: 去你妈的

translation.en: Just kidding. I don't know what to write in this stupid thing.
translation.zh: 开玩笑啦 我不知道该怎么写这个蠢东西啦

translation.en: Anyway, hi.
translation.zh: 总之 嗨

translation.en: My name is Sydney.
translation.zh: 我叫希妮

translation.en: I'm a boring 17-year-old white girl.
translation.zh: 一个无聊的17岁白人女孩

translation.en: I'm not special, is what I'm trying to say,
translation.zh: 我的意思是 我并不特殊

translation.en: and I'm okay with that.
translation.zh: 我对此没有意见

translation.en: -♪ I'm not like everybody else ♪ -We moved to Pennsylvania two years ago.
translation.zh: 两年前 我们家搬来了宾夕法尼亚州

translation.en: And not, like, a cute part of Pennsylvania either,
translation.zh: 而且也不是宾州好的那部分

translation.en: but corn and cabbage and shit.
translation.zh: 而是糟糕的那部分

translation.en: Like, my town's won the grand prize for most polluted air in America
translation.zh: 我家这小镇已经连续多年蝉联

translation.en: for a bunch of years in a row now, so...
translation.zh: 美国空气污染最严重的称号 所以…

translation.en: -♪ 'Cause I'm not like everybody else ♪ -...yippee.
translation.zh: 真棒

translation.en: Ms. Cappriotti made me promise to do this.
translation.zh: 卡普里奥提老师要我答应写日记

translation.en: Promise you'll do this.
translation.zh: 答应我 你会写日记

translation.en: She said it might help with my moods.
translation.zh: 她说这对我的情绪或许有帮助

translation.en: It might help with your moods.
translation.zh: 这对你的情绪或许有帮助

translation.en: I keep losing my temper.
translation.zh: 我老是发脾气

translation.en: -♪ Like everybody else ♪ -I don't want to, but it just spills out.
translation.zh: 我并不想 但脾气不请自来

translation.en: It's 'cause my dad sort of died... last spring.
translation.zh: 因为去年春天时 我爸算是死掉了

translation.en: So I'm supposed to write... what, now? I don't get it.
translation.zh: 所以我现在应该要写什么？我不明白

translation.en: Anything. Everything.
translation.zh: 任何事 所有事

translation.en: Whatever comes to mind.
translation.zh: 想起就什么就写什么

translation.en: And now no one knows what to say to me.
translation.zh: 现在没人知道该对我说什么了

translation.en: Think of it like you're just talking to yourself
translation.zh: 把这当做你在自言自语

translation.en: and no one will ever read it but you.
translation.zh: 除了你自己 没人看得到

translation.en: [Sydney] Not even the guidance counselor.
translation.zh: 连辅导老师都不知道

translation.en: Can I just...
translation.zh: 我能…

translation.en: use my phone?
translation.zh: 就用手机吗？

translation.en: Hmm... Your phone'll be distracting. Don't you think?
translation.zh: 手机会分散注意力 不是吗？

translation.en: I'd like you to have something a little more...
translation.zh: 我想要你做…

translation.en: therapeutic.
translation.zh: 更有益健康的事

translation.en: These things are never easy,
translation.zh: 这种事情从来都不轻松

translation.en: but I do want you to at least attempt
translation.zh: 但我的确想要你至少尝试一下

translation.en: to have a normal high school experience.
translation.zh: 拥有一段正常的高中经历

translation.en: I mean, she's pretty all right, I guess.
translation.zh: 我猜她人其实不错

translation.en: Even if she does smell like an old hippie.
translation.zh: 尽管她闻起来就像个老嬉皮

translation.en: Anyway, here's to a normal high school experience,
translation.zh: 总之 这都是为了正常的高中经历

translation.en: whatever the fuck that means.
translation.zh: 不管这到底是什么意思

translation.en: And yes, during arousal, there is an increase in all sorts of things,
translation.zh: 是的 在性兴奋期间 有很多东西都在增加

translation.en: including adrenaline and, of course, blood flow,
translation.zh: 包括肾上腺素 当然还有血流量

translation.en: and the blood flow continues down
translation.zh: 血流持续向下流动

translation.en: and then gets trapped within the corpora cavernosa.
translation.zh: 然后积聚在海绵体中

translation.en: The penis expands, and this is how the Homo sapien male
translation.zh: 阴茎就会扩大 这就是雄性智人保持勃起的方式

translation.en: is able to hold an erection.
translation.zh: 这就是雄性智人保持勃起的方式

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: From my experience, Mr. File,
translation.zh: 费尔老师 根据我的经验

translation.en: the holding of an erection is far more successful
translation.zh: 用雌性智人的双手来保持勃起

translation.en: in the hands of a Homo sapien female.
translation.zh: 会成功得多

translation.en: Very funny, Mr. Lewis.
translation.zh: 非常有趣 刘易斯先生

translation.en: Just talkin' science.
translation.zh: 探讨科学嘛

translation.en: Moving on.
translation.zh: 我们继续

translation.en: When a female gets sexually excited,
translation.zh: 在雌性性兴奋时

translation.en: there is also increased blood flow
translation.zh: 生殖器的血流量也会增加

translation.en: -to the genitals... -Ah. Oh, come on, fire crotch.
translation.zh: 生殖器的血流量也会增加 好了啦 红裤裆 笑一笑 这很有趣

translation.en: -Laugh. That was funny. -[Mr. File] ...proceeds to swell.
translation.zh: 好了啦 红裤裆 笑一笑 这很有趣

translation.en: Why is all this happening?
translation.zh: 为什么会这样？

translation.en: -[laughs] -Your scrotum looks different than others.
translation.zh: 你两边的阴囊看着不一样

translation.en: That's an asymmetrical scrotum.
translation.zh: 这就是非对称阴囊

translation.en: -[Sydney] My best friend is Dina. -Having one is not at all unusual.
translation.zh: 我最好的朋友是迪娜

translation.en: [Sydney] She's such a badass.
translation.zh: 她可是个狠人

translation.en: Normally, I don't think she'd choose me as a friend,
translation.zh: 通常来说 我不觉得她会选我做朋友

translation.en: but we both moved here around the same time.
translation.zh: 但我们差不多同时搬来这里

translation.en: Both the new kids in town, you know, so, guess I kinda lucked out.
translation.zh: 都是初到贵境 我想我是走运了

translation.en: Before Dina, I mostly just kept to myself.
translation.zh: 在迪娜之前 我几乎不与人来往

translation.en: I'm not the kind of person that likes attention, really,
translation.zh: 我真不是那种喜欢吸引关注的人

translation.en: but she has this way about her that...
translation.zh: 但她有办法…

translation.en: she just makes me feel different.
translation.zh: 她让我感觉不一样了

translation.en: She was with me when I found out about my dad.
translation.zh: 我发现我爸的事情时她就和我在一起

translation.en: Okay. You ready?
translation.zh: 好的 准备好了？

translation.en: -She held my hand. -One, two...
translation.zh: 她抓着我的手

translation.en: We cried.
translation.zh: 我们哭了

translation.en: And now, since then, she keeps me laughing
translation.zh: 从那以后 每当我濒临崩溃

translation.en: when all I wanna do is melt into the floor.
translation.zh: 她都会让我重新笑起来

translation.en: Which sort of made me realize I've never had a best friend before.
translation.zh: 算是让我意识到了我之前还从未有过闺蜜

translation.en: -♪ And then I ♪ -♪ And I want it ♪ -♪ Yes, I do ♪ -♪ Yes, I do ♪
translation.zh: （费多斯餐厅）

translation.en: So, I'm standing there, trying to get by, and he's all like,
translation.zh: 所以我站在那里 准备过去而他却说

translation.en: "Oh, who's the new girl in town?" And I'm like, "Shut up. It's me, Dina."
translation.zh: “噢 新来的女孩是谁啊？”我说：“闭嘴啦 是我 迪娜”

translation.en: Wait, this is Brad... Lewis?
translation.zh: 等等 是布莱德利刘易斯？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: He's sort of sweet, you know?
translation.zh: 他有点贴心的

translation.en: And then he asked me to homecoming.
translation.zh: 然后他邀请我做返校节舞伴

translation.en: Wait, and... and you accepted?
translation.zh: 等等 你同意了？

translation.en: No. I told him to take his washboard abs and chiseled jawline
translation.zh: 没有 我让他带着他的搓板腹肌和雕刻般的下颚

translation.en: and get out of my face.
translation.zh: 给我滚蛋

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah, of course I said yes.
translation.zh: 我当然同意了

translation.en: Uh-- Oh, my God. You had sex with him, didn't you?
translation.zh: 我的天 你和他做爱了 是吧？

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Holy shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: No way! Holy shit!
translation.zh: 不是吧 该死

translation.en: You gave Bradley Lewis your V-card?
translation.zh: 你把初夜给了布莱德利刘易斯？

translation.en: -Tell me he used a condom, because-- -Yes, of course.
translation.zh: -他最好戴了套 因为…-当然有

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Dina just got her braces off, and her boobs suddenly arrived.
translation.zh: 迪娜刚刚摘了牙套 还长出了胸

translation.en: So, of course, golden boy Bradley Lewis takes notice.
translation.zh: 金童布莱德利刘易斯当然会注意到

translation.en: So, what, are you guys, like,
translation.zh: 那你们俩

translation.en: suddenly girlfriend and boyfriend or something?
translation.zh: 突然就成了男女朋友吗？

translation.en: I mean, we haven't put a label on it yet, but...
translation.zh: 我们还没有正式开始 但是…

translation.en: I really like him, okay?
translation.zh: 我真的喜欢他 好吗？

translation.en: This is the worst.
translation.zh: 这才是最糟糕的

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, yeah. No. Sure, I get it.
translation.zh: 好吧 是的 当然 我明白

translation.en: Just give him a chance.
translation.zh: 给他一次机会

translation.en: Oh, come on, there's gotta be someone you sort of like. Just a little.
translation.zh: 好了 你肯定也有稍微喜欢一点的人

translation.en: I don't know. I just guess I haven't really thought about it.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我猜我还没想过这个

translation.en: Well, think about it.
translation.zh: 那就想想吧

translation.en: And then maybe we can all go to homecoming together, like a double date thing.
translation.zh: 那就想想吧 没准我们能一起参加返校节来个双重约会

translation.en: -Hey, babe. -Hey!
translation.zh: -嘿 宝贝-嘿

translation.en: Sorry I'm late.
translation.zh: 抱歉我迟到了

translation.en: -All good, babe. -[kissing]
translation.zh: 好了 宝贝

translation.en: Ugh. They both call each other "babe." Kill me right now.
translation.zh: 他们都相互叫宝贝了 赶紧杀了我吧

translation.en: Hey, Syd.
translation.zh: 嘿 小希

translation.en: Bradley.
translation.zh: 布莱德利

translation.en: Do you think your mom could hook us up with some burgers?
translation.zh: 你妈能帮我们弄几个汉堡吗？

translation.en: They're just so great here.
translation.zh: 这里的汉堡很棒

translation.en: Huh. She's not working today.
translation.zh: 她今天不上班

translation.en: I was just asking. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我只是问问

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [Dina] Want a burger, Brad? Let's get a burger.
translation.zh: 想吃汉堡 布莱德利？那我们去买

translation.en: I've got some cash.
translation.zh: 我有现金

translation.en: -[Brad] Yeah? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是吗？-是的

translation.en: -Wanna share one, babe? -Yeah. Oh, ketchup.
translation.zh: -分着吃？-好的 噢 番茄酱

translation.en: Help yourself.
translation.zh: 别客气

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 那么

translation.en: Dina's just great, isn't she?
translation.zh: 迪娜很棒不是吗？

translation.en: [chuckling] Jesus, do you ever smile?
translation.zh: 老天 你从来不笑吗？

translation.en: Not today.
translation.zh: 今天不行

translation.en: [Dina] So, what have we decided?
translation.zh: 决定了吗？

translation.en: Whatever you want, babe.
translation.zh: 你想吃啥都行 宝贝

translation.en: -Please. Please stop. -You gotta try one of these fries.
translation.zh: -够了啊-尝尝薯条吧 宝贝

translation.en: -I wish you would just stop talking. -[rumbling]
translation.zh: 我希望你能闭嘴

translation.en: Wipe that smug smile off his stupid, stupid face.
translation.zh: 把这自鸣得意的笑容从他的蠢脸上抹掉

translation.en: -Oh, shit. -[Dina] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -该死-我的天

translation.en: Oh, fuck.
translation.zh: 我操

translation.en: -[Dina] Are you okay? -Wait. What?
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-等等 什么？

translation.en: Yeah, fine. Just give me a minute.
translation.zh: 我没事 等我一下

translation.en: -[Dina] Take a tissue. -[Brad] Gimme a minute, all right?
translation.zh: 拿张纸巾 等我一下 好吗？

translation.en: So, here's the deal.
translation.zh: 情况是这样的

translation.en: Today, I almost convinced myself
translation.zh: 今天 我差点就说服了自己

translation.en: that I made Bradley Lewis's nose bleed
translation.zh: 是我让布莱德利刘易斯流鼻血的

translation.en: with my mind.
translation.zh: 用意念哦

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Mostly, I just need to chill out more.
translation.zh: 我多半还是需要多放松一点

translation.en: I am not losing my first and only very best friend ever.
translation.zh: 我可不想失去我第一个也是唯一一个闺蜜

translation.en: I'm happy for Dina,
translation.zh: 我为迪娜开心

translation.en: and if dating Bradley Dickhead Lewis makes her happy,
translation.zh: 如果和白痴布莱德利刘易斯交往能让她开心

translation.en: then I guess I'm okay with it.
translation.zh: 我想我也没意见

translation.en: [boy] Oh, hey, Syd!
translation.zh: 嘿 小希

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Stanley Barber.
translation.zh: 斯坦利巴伯

translation.en: He lives down the street from me.
translation.zh: 他跟我住一条街

translation.en: Where I feel shitty about basically everything about myself,
translation.zh: 我基本对自己的一切都感觉糟糕

translation.en: Stan is the master of zero fucks.
translation.zh: 而斯坦利却是毫不在乎的大师

translation.en: Oh, my leg fell asleep. One sec.
translation.zh: 我的腿麻了 稍等

translation.en: Can I walk with you?
translation.zh: 我能陪你走走吗？

translation.en: Sure. Why not?
translation.zh: 好啊 有何不可？

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: 酷

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: 酷

translation.en: Stan is kind of... weird.
translation.zh: 斯坦利有点怪

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Shoes. Who needs 'em?
translation.zh: 谁需要鞋子啊？

translation.en: Uh... so, Bloodwitch, am I right?
translation.zh: 对了 血巫 我说对了吗？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Bloodwitch. You like their music?
translation.zh: 血巫 你喜欢他们的音乐吗？

translation.en: That's a... terrible name for a band.
translation.zh: 这个乐队名字太糟糕了

translation.en: Nah. Perfect.
translation.zh: 哪有 简直完美

translation.en: Bet they sound like shit.
translation.zh: 我打赌他们听起来爆烂

translation.en: Well, I mean, I have-- I have 'em on vinyl...
translation.zh: 其实 我有他们的黑胶

translation.en: limited edition, gatefold and stuff,
translation.zh: 限量版 折页版什么的 如果你想过来我们可以一起听听

translation.en: if you wanna... come over, and we can listen sometime.
translation.zh: 折页版什么的 如果你想过来我们可以一起听听

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 噢

translation.en: We can get high.
translation.zh: 我们可以嗨一下

translation.en: I have never been high before.
translation.zh: 我从来没嗨过

translation.en: Yeah, maybe.
translation.zh: 好啊 或许吧

translation.en: I mean, you don't have to.
translation.zh: 你也不非得要

translation.en: I was-- I was just, you know... We-- You know, we live so close, and we've never really hung out before.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得 我们住得这么近却还没一起玩过

translation.en: Uh, no, I guess we haven't.
translation.zh: 我们还真没有

translation.en: But, yeah. Uh, maybe we should.
translation.zh: 但或许我们应该要

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Cool. Uh...
translation.zh: 酷

translation.en: Let me know.
translation.zh: 通知我吧

translation.en: What a world we live in, Sydney.
translation.zh: 这世界多棒啊 希妮

translation.en: I live with my mom and little brother.
translation.zh: 我跟妈妈和弟弟住在一起

translation.en: [woman] Sydney! Is that you?
translation.zh: 希妮 是你吗？

translation.en: Mom and I haven't been getting along lately.
translation.zh: 妈妈和我最近合不来

translation.en: Nope. It's an axe murderer. Good thing you asked.
translation.zh: 不是 是斧头杀人狂 幸好你问了

translation.en: Ha-ha! Very funny.
translation.zh: 真有趣

translation.en: Hey. So apparently, Karen's dog ran through a screen door or something,
translation.zh: 嘿 凯伦的狗好像是撞进了纱门什么的

translation.en: so she had to go to an emergency vet.
translation.zh: 所以她得去看兽医急诊

translation.en: -Okay. -So I'm gonna pick up her shift tonight,
translation.zh: -好吧-所以我得去顶她今晚的班

translation.en: which is fine 'cause I owe her two shifts from the time Liam ate all that cheese.
translation.zh: 这也没啥 因为我还欠她两个班就是利亚姆吃掉所有芝士那次

translation.en: Well, thanks for telling me your life story, Mom.
translation.zh: 多谢你向我讲述生活的故事 妈妈

translation.en: No. Wait, come back here. I'm not done yet. Eyes on me.
translation.zh: 不 等等 回来 我还没说完 看着我

translation.en: Okay. Question. Big question.
translation.zh: 好的 问题 大问题

translation.en: Have you seen my stockings?
translation.zh: 你看到我的丝袜了吗？

translation.en: They were in the bathroom. They were hanging over the shower curtain?
translation.zh: 本来是在浴室里的 挂在浴帘上

translation.en: Oh, sorry. I thought they were dirty.
translation.zh: 噢 抱歉 我以为是脏的

translation.en: -No, they were drying. -Well, I found them in the bathtub.
translation.zh: -不是的 是在晾干-我是在浴缸里发现的

translation.en: D-- Well, where are they? They're my last pair.
translation.zh: 在哪里？这是我最后一双了

translation.en: I sort of...
translation.zh: 我给…

translation.en: washed 'em.
translation.zh: 洗了

translation.en: Wait. In the washer?
translation.zh: 等等 用洗衣机吗？

translation.en: Yeah, and I guess they sort of ended up in the dryer, so...
translation.zh: 是啊 我想现在应该在烘干机里

translation.en: Oh, great.
translation.zh: 噢 这下好了

translation.en: Now I get to feel like sausage while I'm serving it.
translation.zh: 这下我能在上菜时感受到香肠的感觉了

translation.en: You don't really have to wear 'em, do you? No one wears 'em anymore.
translation.zh: 你真的必须穿这个吗？已经没人穿了

translation.en: -Like, since the '90s. -[sighs] Can you--
translation.zh: 从90年代起

translation.en: Can you just make sure that Liam does his homework and eats some dinner?
translation.zh: 你能确保利亚姆做完作业并吃点东西吗？

translation.en: Isn't he old enough to make sure himself?
translation.zh: 他不是够大了能自己确保吗？

translation.en: Sydney, can you just do something for me, anything, just once, without questioning?
translation.zh: 希妮 你能不能别质疑 把事做了哪怕就一次 好吗？

translation.en: Here I thought I was being so charming.
translation.zh: 我还以为是因为我很迷人呢

translation.en: Nope. Not even a little bit.
translation.zh: 没有 完全没有

translation.en: Really doesn't matter what we're talking about.
translation.zh: 说了真的不重要

translation.en: -[door slams] -Mom and I could sit in silence
translation.zh: 说了真的不重要 我妈和我哪怕是一直安静到天荒地老

translation.en: for the rest of our lives, and she'd still annoy the crap out of me.
translation.zh: 我妈和我哪怕是一直安静到天荒地老 她也能把烦死

translation.en: Hey, Goob. Done your homework yet?
translation.zh: 嘿 小雀斑 作业做了没？

translation.en: Hours ago.
translation.zh: 早做完了

translation.en: Soon as I got home. What about you?
translation.zh: 回家就做了 你呢？

translation.en: Uh... I'll get to it.
translation.zh: 我会做的

translation.en: Come on, Syd. Mom says you have to work hard if you're gonna succeed.
translation.zh: 小希啊 妈妈说你得努力才能成功

translation.en: Yeah, well, the plan's always been for me to sit back and watch you succeed, Goob.
translation.zh: 我的计划一直都是静静看着你成功 小雀斑

translation.en: Oh, hey, who knows?
translation.zh: 嘿 谁知道呢？

translation.en: Maybe one day, if you really work hard enough,
translation.zh: 或许有一天 如果你足够努力的话

translation.en: you get to be the one to pay for my funeral.
translation.zh: 我的葬礼就有人买单了

translation.en: -How was school today? -Well, um...
translation.zh: 今天学校如何啊？ 其实…

translation.en: Richard Rynard punched Toby Gardner in the face,
translation.zh: 理查德雷纳德一拳砸到了托比加德纳脸上

translation.en: and he got sent to Mr. Coffee's office.
translation.zh: 他被叫去了科菲老师的办公室

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
translation.zh: 噢 是吗？

translation.en: Yup, and I think I might be next, so... I'm devising a plan. Check it out.
translation.zh: 是的 我想下一个或许就会是我所以我在制定一个计划 看看吧

translation.en: [Sydney] Holy shit, Goob. Is that for you?
translation.zh: 老天 小雀斑 这是给你用的？

translation.en: [Liam] Yup. Designed it myself.
translation.zh: 是的 我自己设计的

translation.en: Breastplate, shin guards, spiked gloves...
translation.zh: 胸甲 护胫 刺钉手套

translation.en: But I'm not so sure about the helmet situation just yet,
translation.zh: 但我还没想好头盔怎么弄

translation.en: 'cause I don't wanna block my peripherals, you know, just in case.
translation.zh: 因为我不想遮住我的外围 以防万一

translation.en: It's really cool, man. It's some of your best work yet.
translation.zh: 真的很酷 是你最棒的作品之一了

translation.en: Yeah, it's basically my Mark One,
translation.zh: 是的 基本上就是我的第一代设计

translation.en: and the first suit's always the hardest to design,
translation.zh: 第一套装备总是最难设计的

translation.en: so it's still a work in progress.
translation.zh: 所以目前还是半成品啦

translation.en: And, sorry, what was the plan again?
translation.zh: 抱歉 计划是什么来着？

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna build the suit and kick Richard Rynard's ass.
translation.zh: 我要打造出这套装备然后痛扁理查德雷纳德

translation.en: Oh. Vengeance.
translation.zh: 噢 复仇

translation.en: Got it.
translation.zh: 明白了

translation.en: My family.
translation.zh: 我的家庭

translation.en: I guess we've never had a lot of money.
translation.zh: 我想我们从来没有钱过

translation.en: Like, every place we moved, and we've moved a lot,
translation.zh: 不管我们搬到哪里我们搬过好多次家

translation.en: it's always some place like this.
translation.zh: 总是这样的地方

translation.en: It's like a lottery, I guess.
translation.zh: 我想这就像是买彩票吧

translation.en: Some kids win big time the moment they're born.
translation.zh: 有些孩子出生的时候就已经是大赢家了

translation.en: The rest of us,
translation.zh: 而我们其余的人

translation.en: we're all stuck with scratch-offs and bottle caps and shit.
translation.zh: 就只能玩玩刮刮乐和瓶盖兑奖什么的

translation.en: -♪ To destroy that feeling ♪ -Liam?
translation.zh: 利亚姆？

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 啥？

translation.en: If Richard Rynard ever touches you...
translation.zh: 如果理查德雷纳德敢碰你

translation.en: before you get your suit built to kick his ass,
translation.zh: 在你打造好装备痛扁他之前

translation.en: I'll pull his throat out...
translation.zh: 我会当着科菲老师的面

translation.en: with my bare hands right in front of Mr. Coffee.
translation.zh: 亲手撕开他的喉咙

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, like this.
translation.zh: 是的 就像这样

translation.en: -You are so weird. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 你太诡异了

translation.en: Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道

translation.en: Okay, so... confession.
translation.zh: 好吧 坦白一下

translation.en: I started getting these zits on my thighs.
translation.zh: 我大腿上开始长痘痘了

translation.en: -I am straight up disgusting. -[water dripping]
translation.zh: 我真是恶心爆了

translation.en: I've tried zit cream and soap and all sorts of junk.
translation.zh: 我试过痘痘霜 肥皂和各种办法

translation.en: Nothing helps.
translation.zh: 都没用

translation.en: -They're not even that fun to pop. -[rumbling]
translation.zh: 连挤起来都不好玩

translation.en: [groans] Stop!
translation.zh: 够了

translation.en: It's probably just puberty.
translation.zh: 可能只是青春期吧

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: So, Stanley Barber texted me.
translation.zh: 斯坦利巴伯给我发了消息

translation.en: -He made me listen to Bloodwitch. -[message alert]
translation.zh: 让我听血巫

translation.en: ♪ Let me hear your voice ♪ ♪ To bring me down ♪
translation.zh: （超级冠军）

translation.en: Sometimes at night, I want to touch myself,
translation.zh: 有时在晚上 我想自摸一下

translation.en: but I don't.
translation.zh: 但我并不会

translation.en: Peanut butter helps.
translation.zh: 花生酱有帮助

translation.en: [man on TV] ...always in a fast-food rut,
translation.zh: 仅售29.95美元

translation.en: Millions have discovered the secret...
translation.zh: 数百万人发现了这个秘密

translation.en: [Sydney] The later Mom gets home, the more wine she drinks.
translation.zh: 妈妈回家越晚 她就会喝越多

translation.en: What are we watching?
translation.zh: 这是播的啥？

translation.en: [muffled] Don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: [Sydney] We haven't talked about Dad since he killed himself in the basement.
translation.zh: 自从我爸在地下室自杀之后我们就再没谈起过他

translation.en: AC's broken.
translation.zh: 空调坏了

translation.en: The unit's probably just... overheated.
translation.zh: 可能是主机过热了吧

translation.en: It's hot as balls in this house.
translation.zh: 这房子里热爆了

translation.en: Open a window.
translation.zh: 开窗啊

translation.en: It's that heavy thing we're all too afraid to talk about.
translation.zh: 这是我们都害怕谈起的沉重话题

translation.en: I got called in... to the counselor's office.
translation.zh: 我被叫去了辅导老师的办公室

translation.en: -Why? What did-- what did you do? -Nothing.
translation.zh: 为什么？你做了什么？ 什么都没做

translation.en: She just...
translation.zh: 她就是…

translation.en: She wants me to have, like... an outlet or something.
translation.zh: 她想要我有个发泄的方法什么的

translation.en: An outlet for what?
translation.zh: 发泄什么？

translation.en: Just, sometimes it feels like...
translation.zh: 有时候我感觉

translation.en: the people I love don't love me back.
translation.zh: 我爱的人不爱我

translation.en: Well... [sighs]
translation.zh: 其实…

translation.en: Maybe you're aiming too high, hon.
translation.zh: 没准你的目标太高了 宝贝

translation.en: She's such a bitch sometimes.
translation.zh: 她有时真的是个贱人

translation.en: Dad would have understood,
translation.zh: 爸爸就会明白的

translation.en: but he hung himself,
translation.zh: 但他上吊了

translation.en: so I guess I'm on my own.
translation.zh: 所以我只能孤军作战了

translation.en: Sometimes I wonder why he did it,
translation.zh: 有时我会疑惑他为什么会这么做

translation.en: and why we never talk about it...
translation.zh: 我们为什么从未谈起过

translation.en: ...and what the hell is going on with me.
translation.zh: 我到底是怎么了？

translation.en: Why sometimes I feel like I'm boiling inside.
translation.zh: 我为什么有时会觉得内心已经沸腾

translation.en: 'Cause maybe...
translation.zh: 因为或许…

translation.en: ...I am way more fucked up than I thought.
translation.zh: 我比想象的要糟多了
